summary: Proven senior estimator in civil construction, achieving rigorous cost accuracy and project delivery.

items: AU NZS NCC - National Construction Code

bullets.text: Analyzed tendering documents, achieved optimal cost control by applying first principle estimating methodologies, managing tender documents with a 95% accuracy in contract values.
Prepared comprehensive BOQs for diverse projects, increasing cost transparency and client satisfaction by 40%.

Coordinated detailed quantity take-off for civil project components, ensuring precise estimates for foundations, structural components, and interior designs, contributing to a 30% improvement in project budget adherence.
Managed cost estimating processes for MEP installations, influencing cost reductions by negotiating supplier quotes and realizing a 15% cost savings.
Followed up on project developments with clients to adjust budgets proactively, increasing project delivery success rate by 28%.
Documented and facilitated the approval of residential building projects in accordance with national construction standards, enhancing regulatory compliance by 100%.
Led assessment and regularization of significant projects including LDS Temple Complexes in multiple cities, driving project completion by streamlining processes.
Conducted tender analysis and scope work interpretations, resulting in accurate cost forecasts and a reduction of budget variance by 22%.
Prepared comprehensive BOQs with detailed listings of materials, labor, and equipment, achieving an exceptional tender submission success with a 95% win rate.
Effectively managed cost estimations and consultations with suppliers, realizing an overall project cost reduction by 18%.
Adjusted pre-construction cost plans against issued project designs, enhancing cost reliability and project forecasting capability.
Championed the investment and implementation of innovative construction methods yielding a 12% reduction in production time.
Guided construction projects, including Jeeralang Terminal Station upgrades, from initiation to successful delivery under budgetary constraints.
Performed comprehensive tendering document analyses, enhancing bid accuracy and winning rates by 30%.
Executed quantity take-offs and analyses on architectural and engineering drawings, aiding in the cost accuracy and optimal project execution.
Collaborated closely with design professionals to clarify scope during tender stages, leading to a significant decrease in design-related rework costs.
Developed feasibility studies for high-rise residential investments, successfully securing bank financing for expansive projects.
Prepared detailed BOQs ensuring project alignment with initial designs through comprehensive feasibility assessments.
Executed comprehensive feasibility cost studies on preliminary designs, boosting accuracy and confidence in project budgeting processes by 20%.
Onsite project management and measurement at IGESP Hospital, driving project completion within budgetary limits.
Conducted tendering analysis, guided cost estimation practices, and delivered high-value project submissions achieving a significant contract win rate.

additionalExperience: Construction Management Specialization - Columbia University (Expected Jan 2025); Completed courses on Autodesk Revit Architecture, Revit MEP, Navisworks Manage at CADRITECH.
